commit message:
null-check some things in bookmarks management (bug report of
NullPointerException).
Finalize folder selection/creation in bookmarks creation activity.

Bookmarks folder UI. Need work in tablet mode. Provide something to
delete a folder.

Various UI updates; keep selected/tab folder in bookmarks/history
activity when orientation change; Differents margins for
portrait/landscape.
Add back icons in bookmarks folder breadcrumb.
More robust addons management, in case of invalid return from addons.
Add animations for showing/hiding bookmarks folders breadcrumb.

Update folder delete (also delete child folders, show a progress
dialog), update folder navigation.
Limit folders choice in spinner to first level folders.

Make the changelog in the about fragment scrollable instead of the whole
view.
Change question ids to int, specified by addon developers.
